Text.Page:
My orders are to infiltrate the fortress and gather intel on Thulsa's legions and their conspirators. The mission is hindered by the presence of the {@LinkCreature:27#6#merciless iskaragards} and {@LinkCreature:27#7#savage iskaragards}.

If you could engage them for awhile, we could proceed. You should probably kill a good number of them to draw attention fully upon yourself. Good luck!

The loss of the iskaragards has thrown the sentries into confusion. There are several weaknesses to exploit now, thanks to you.

Your fight is over, but our mission's just beginning. Farewell!
